channel.title: Illegal expression and ; placement
channel.description:
client.java:7697: illegal start of expression && (playerRights > 3)) { ^ client.java:7697: ';' expected && (playerRights > 3)) { ^ client.java:7711: illegal start of expression && (playerRights > 3)) { ^ client.java:7711: ';' expected && (playerRights > 3)) { ^ client.java:7762: illegal start of expression && (playerRights > 3)) { ^ client.java:7762: ';' expected && (playerRights > 3)) { ^ 6 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
demise pking source and client, which is a delta base. ugh im dumb lol. ive only been editting but when i try this it does this on me. i know i need ; but where exactly do i put it? and what do i do on illegal expressions? :S

item.title: Illegal expression and ; placement
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

sorry, its confusing, and i dont know what to add and what not to so you guys can see. im just going to delete it for now, and see where i go from there. its no big deal.

Read full topic

item.title: Illegal expression and ; placement
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

&& (playerRights > 3)) {

I believe there is an unneeded brace ))

i saved and compiled.
[/quote]

kk. if nobody knows i will.
